00038     mib_handler_methods *methods;
00039     
00040     if (!handler->myvoid) {
00041         snmp_log(LOG_INFO, "improperly registered multiplexer found\n");
00042         return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00043     }
00044 
00045     methods = (mib_handler_methods *) handler->myvoid;
00046 
00047     switch(reqinfo->mode) {
00048         case MODE_GET:
00049             handler = methods->get_handler;
00050             if (!handler) {
00051                 set_all_requests_error(reqinfo, requests, SNMP_NOSUCHOBJECT);
00052             }
00053             break;
00054 
00055         case MODE_GETNEXT:
00056             handler = methods->getnext_handler;
00057             if (!handler) /* fallback to get handler */
00058                 handler = methods->get_handler;
00059             break;
00060 
00061         case MODE_GETBULK:
00062             /* XXX: this needs to do better getbulk -> getnext
00063                handling (probably via a separate helper) */
00064             handler = methods->getbulk_handler;
00065             if (!handler) /* fallback to getnext handler */
00066                 handler = methods->getnext_handler;
00067             if (!handler) /* fallback to getnext handler */
00068                 handler = methods->get_handler;
00069             break;
00070 
00071         case MODE_SET_RESERVE1:
00072         case MODE_SET_RESERVE2:
00073         case MODE_SET_ACTION:
00074         case MODE_SET_COMMIT:
00075         case MODE_SET_FREE:
00076         case MODE_SET_UNDO:
00077             handler = methods->set_handler;
00078             if (!handler) {
00079                 set_all_requests_error(reqinfo, requests, SNMP_ERR_NOTWRITABLE);
00080                 return SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00081             }
00082             break;
00083             
00084         /* XXX: process SETs specially, and possibly others */
00085         default:
00086             snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "unsupported mode for multiplexer: %d\n",
00087                      reqinfo->mode);
00088             return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00089     }
00090     if (!handler) {
00091         snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "No handler enabled for mode %d in multiplexer\n",
00092                  reqinfo->mode);
00093         return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00094     }
00095     return call_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo, requests);
00096 }
